original_text: He said to Jacob, “Quick, let me have some of that red stew! I’m famished!” (That is why he was also called Edom.)
korean_text: 야곱에게 이르되 내가 피곤하니 그 붉은 것을 내가 먹게 하라 한지라 그러므로 에서의 별명은 에돔이더라

sentences.original_text: Quick, let me have some of that red stew!
sentences.korean_translation: 어서, 저 붉은 스튜를 좀 줘!

sentences.original_text: That is why he was also called Edom
